ATLANTA - SOFTWARE ENGINEER (FULL TIME, ALL LEVELS) - VISAS WELCOME - ONSITE

Pindrop is a phone fraud security startup headquartered in Atlanta and growing like crazy after our third round of funding earlier this year for $75M. Our engineering team is doubling in size (from 50 to 100) and immediately seeking passionate software engineers, from entry- to senior-level, to join our awesome team.

Tech Stack: Python, Linux, MySQL, Agile

Perks: conference budgets, flex hours, casual dress, game nights, tech talks, lots of free food and coffee, and more

Please shoot an email to talent@pindropsecurity.com if you're interested in learning more.
